{"id":1480615427,"question_id":2816,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734386729,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1480615427/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Lexicographically Smallest Palindrome","memory":"20.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeSmallestPalindrome(string s) {\n        int n = s.length();\n        int left=0;\n        int right=n-1;\n        string ret(n, 0);;\n        while(left<right) {\n            if(s[left]<=s[right]) {\n                ret[left]=ret[right]=s[left];\n            }else if(s[left]>s[right]) {\n                ret[left]=ret[right]=s[right];\n            }\n            left++;\n            right--;\n        }\n        if(n%2==1)\n            ret[n/2] = s[n/2];\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"lexicographically-smallest-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
